meanings.sent1: The bank underwritten the loan for the new business.
meanings.sent2: Her parents underwritten her college tuition fees.
meanings.sent3: The generous donation underwritten the entire charity event.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a reliable investor underwritten his ability to secure funding.
meanings.sent5: The insurance policy underwritten the cost of the medical procedure.

meanings.definition: To sign one's name at the end of a document to show that one has written it
meanings.sent1: She underwritten the contract with a flourish.
meanings.sent2: He underwritten the will to make it legally binding.
meanings.sent3: The artist underwritten the painting with their signature.
meanings.sent4: The author underwritten the manuscript before sending it to the publisher.
meanings.sent5: The student underwritten the essay to submit it for grading.

meanings.definition: To insure or provide financial backing for something
meanings.sent1: The insurance company underwritten the policy for the new car.
meanings.sent2: The government underwritten the project to ensure its success.
meanings.sent3: The investor underwritten the startup to help it grow.
meanings.sent4: The bank underwritten the mortgage for the first-time homebuyer.
meanings.sent5: The company underwritten the health insurance for all employees.
